file_insights.changes_summary: Added aria-label attributes to multiple action buttons

patterns_discovered: Consistent aria-label placement for interactive elements
Use of descriptive, action-oriented labels for accessibility
Maintaining existing button structure while adding accessibility attributes
gotchas_discovered: Some buttons required dynamic aria-label generation (e.g., Start button with gpuName)
Preserving existing title attributes while adding aria-labels
recommendations: Continue adding aria-labels to all interactive elements
Review remaining buttons in the application for similar accessibility improvements
